Simple text
.
test test
.
<p>test test</p>
.

One page number
.
test [# 23] test
.
<p>test <a href="#pn23" id="pn23" class="book-page-number" data-pn="23">[23]</a> test</p>
.

With header
.
# Page number with suffix
test [#23 8] test
.
<h1>header</h1>
<p>test <a href="#pn23" id="pn23" class="book-page-number" data-pn="23">[23]</a> test</p>
.
